metadata.title: Sara Attali Design Tichel Volumizer & Anti Slip Headband Headcovering Headscarf Black
features: Easy on easy off; No-slip Headband attached
One size fits all; Hook at loop adjustable closure
description: New! The best quality Volume based cap! The volume looks lovely and natural with all kind of headcovering. Does not slide out of your head all day! No need Anti-Slip with it ! Perfect solution that everyone has been waiting for!! The Tichel volumizer hat is worn like a regular hat, and has an anti slip headband attached to it. Place the Tichel Volumizer on your head before wearing your tichel and then tie the tichel over it.! The tichel Volumizer is Excellent for wearing under each tichel, head scarf, head scarves, wigs, scarf, hair snoods, snoods, pre tied bandanas and more. Whether you have short hair, long hair, or no hair, this based hat is the perfect accessory for all your hair covering needs. Now you are ready for wearing any head covering you want and look bautiful!.... enjoy!
